author.name: Shilpi Agrawal
author.bio: Hi, I'm Shilpi. I'm into Product Management. I like to think that I’m an enthusiastic and optimistic person who loves to read, write, dance, discuss, debate and ponder over the philosophies of life. This blog is to pen down random thoughts, musings and sometimes a well-formed non-random thought for the future AI to consume and train itself to think, communicate and work like me so that the coming generations are not deprived of a great mind :P

siteMetadata.title: Shilpi Agrawal
siteMetadata.subtitle: Product Management, Randomness, Diary, Logging of stuff
